title: Crosley CK-1 Record Cleaning Kit
description: Keep your vinyl in peak playing condition with the Crosley CK-1 record cleaning kit. The supplies--which come in an attractive wood compartment with a hand-rubbed paprika finish--help keep dust, lint, and even small amounts of oil from building up on both vintage and new albums. Once the impurities are removed from the grooves, the analog signal once again sounds vivid and crisp. Plus, cleaning helps extend the life of both the album and the turntable needle. The kit consists of a small container of record cleaning solution and a felt brush, along with three diamond-stylus NP1 replacement needles for when your original needle wears down. The needles are compatible with all Crosley turntables with the exception of the Stack-o-Matics.With the CK-1, cleaning your treasured vinyl has never been easier. The kit measures 5.5 by 3 by 3 inches (W x H x D) and is backed by a 90-day warranty.What's in the BoxHandcrafted wooden anti - static record cleaning brush,One 25cc bottle of distilled water,1-Year Warranty
